Identity.Name: Akaedyn Centurion
Identity.Basic_Description: Large Bidpedal machines (kinda like skyrim centurions) with two large swords made of silve metal.

Abilities.Name: Overwhelming Presence
Abilities.Ability: Enemy units adjacent to Akaedyn Centurion must target Akedyn Centurion when performing an attack.

Abilities.Name: Double Strike
Abilities.Ability: Once per turn during an attack, Akaedyn Centurion may re-roll any number of attack dice.
